title: Mini freezes throughout the game
body: I have been having issues ever since the new map came out (which have been a while now) about mini freezes and sudden fps drops. I am pretty sure it is not my internet or my hardwares' problem. It usually occours during a kill, skill being shot out of a bush, warding in a bush, or seconds from being killed. I have been trying to fix this problem, but nothing have been very effective. Just wondering whether anyone have any suggestions that may fix this problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
